data.text:
Generative AI for Business Meetup this Thursday ! I'm thrilled to announce that I'll be joining an exciting Meetup this Thursday, 4/07 at 17h at BeCentral, to reconnect with alumni of the "AI Black Belt" training programs, friends, and new faces in the AI community. Organized by Accelerate.AI, this event is all about diving into the new opportunities and challenges in generative AI. We'll kick off with: * A general introduction by Nathanael Ackerman (AI4Belgium) * An insight into Generative AI for personal productivity with Jeremy Corman * A look at Generative AI for businesses, including LLM, RAG, and fine-tuning, which I'll be presenting * A panel discussion with Yves Colinet, Denis Vandenbergen, and Valerie Zapico What makes this event even more special for me is that it's connected to the startup I co-founded with Roald Sieberath. We offer a "Talk to your company documents" solution, and I'm excited to share more about the technologies supporting it. If you're passionate about the future of AI training in Belgium and want to help shape the next steps, join us before the summer break. Let's work together on a new version of the training, the "AI Blue Belt", set for September. The theme? "How to Accelerate AI take-up in our companies and society?". Infos and registrations: https://lnkd.in/e9BVxwQ5 Looking forward to seeing you all there! #AccelerateAI #AI #GenerativeAI #AIBlackBelt #AIBlueBelt #MachineLearning #BeCentral #StartUp #Innovation #Training #Belgium

Let's get together again... Join the Accelerate AI Summer Meetup on July 4th, 2024 at BeCentral. This is a fantastic opportunity to catch up, dive into the latest AI advancements, and network with fellow AI professionals. üî• EVENT HIGHLIGHTS: * Welcome word by Nathana√´l Ackerman (AI4Belgium) & Roald Sieberath (AI Black Belt) * Expert talks on leading AI innovations and panel discussion on "How to prepare for the Gen AI wave?" * A demo on leveraging AI with your data (LLM / RAG / fine tuning) with Renaud Bouckenooghe (Accelerate AI) * Networking with the community of AI experts and AI Black Belt Alumni Check the full agenda & REGISTER NOW! Space is limited. https://lnkd.in/eajJcwyt #artificialintelligence #AImeetup #AIBB #AI4belgium #BEtech
